question: The Haripura Session (1938) of Indian National Congress(INC) presided over by whom?
explanation: Under the presidency of Subhas Chandra Bose, the 58th session of Indian National Congress (INC) was held at Haripura, Gujarat in 1938. In this session, a resolution was passed. As per the resolution, a six months ultimatum given to the British Government demanding independence for India, if British fail then congress should launch an all out struggle, to thorw out the British from India.
